preprocess.from sentence: To preprocess the corpus , we use the reversible tokenizer from Stanford CoreNLP .

GloVe embeddings.from sentence: For word embeddings , we use GloVe embeddings pretrained on the 840B Common Crawl corpus as well as character ngram embeddings by .

concatenate.from sentence: In addition , we concatenate these embeddings with context vectors ( CoVe ) trained on .

out of vocabulary words.from sentence: For out of vocabulary words , we set the embeddings and context vectors to zero .

word dropout.from sentence: We perform word dropout on the document which zeros a word embedding with probability 0.075 .

swap.from sentence: In addition , we swap the first maxout layer of the highway maxout network in the DCN decoder with a sparse mixture of experts layer .
